product_title:
SUBLIMAGE LA CRÈME YEUX
ULTIMATE REGENERATION EYE CREAM
product_description:
What it is: A rich, velvety cream that provides complete anti-aging care for the delicate eye area.
What it does: From the rare and potent molecules of the vanilla planifolia plant, CHANEL creates the Éphémères of Planifolia. At the heart of SUBLIMAGE LA CRÈME YEUX, this breakthrough ingredient, along with enriched planifolia PFA (an ultra-pure, ultra-powerful ingredient created through exclusive patented CHANEL technology), addresses the signs of aging by helping to enhance firmness, uniformity of skin tone, hydration and radiance.
How to use: Apply to the eye contour with the accompanying massage tool in the morning and evening. For enhanced benefits, use as a mask. Apply generously and leave on for 10 minutes. Gently remove excess with a cotton pad.
- 0.5 oz.
Item # 5334693
